繮字的基本解释

繮
jiāng
见“缰”。

繮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāng］
［《廣韻》居良切，平陽，見。］
“缰1”的繁体字。亦作“韁1”。
拴牲口的绳子。

繮字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　繮； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页940第17
【廣韻】居良切，音薑。【說文】馬紲也。【博雅】靮謂之繮。【廣韻】亦作韁。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāng］
["Guangyun" Juliangqie, Pingyang, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "缰1". Also known as "Han 1".
The rope to tie the livestock.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　缰; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 940-17
[Guang Yun] Juliang cut, sound ginger. [Said the text] Ma Hao also. 【Liberal Arts】Dao is called the rein. [Guang Yun] also used as rein.
